item.title: [DISTRELEC-6108] WG: Schreibfehler WebShop
item.description:
Hi colleagues,

 

I got feedback of a wrong PropertyKey.

 

sentence: :“wenn Sie kein E-Mail als Login haben, bitte BENÜTZEN sie das untere Formular.

Actually the whole sentence is wrong.

 

Change to: „wenn Sie keine E-Mail als Login haben, dann benutzen Sie bitte das folgende Formular.“

 

 

BR

Mignon

 

 

Von: Doden, Eva
Gesendet: Montag, 10. November 2014 10:17
An: Latoschinski, Mignon
Betreff: Schreibfehler WebShop

 

Hallo Mignon,

 

“wenn Sie kein E-Mail als Login haben, bitte BENÜTZEN sie das untere Formular.

 

 

LG Eva

 

 

 

 

 

Mit freundlichen Grüßen

 

 

i.A. Eva Doden

Verkaufsinnendienst

 

 

Distrelec Schuricht GmbH
Lise-Meitner-Straße 4
28359 Bremen
Germany
T +49 (421) 3654 200

F +49 (421) 3654 236
[1]eva.doden@distrelec.com
[2]www.distrelec.de

 

Bremen HRB 22748 – Geschäftsführer: Jörg-Lothar Loch, Christian Lelonek

This e-mail and any attachments may contain confidential information which is for the sole attention and use of the intended recipient. Please notify us at once if you are not the intended recipient and delete it immediately. Thank you.

 

 
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[1] eva.doden@distrelec.com
[2] http://www.distrelec.de/
[Created via e-mail received from: "Latoschinski, Mignon" <mignon.latoschinski@distrelec.com>]

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Das ist wohl eher für euch. Wir können das leider nicht anpassen.

 

Danke und LG

Sarah

 

 

 

Sarah Blattner
Senior Web Merchandising Specialist

T +41 44 944 95 45

 

Von: Burlet, Rafael
Gesendet: Montag, 17. November 2014 16:32
An: Blattner, Sarah
Cc: Sautter, Oliver
Betreff: WG: Schreibfehler WebShop

 

Hallo Sarah,

 

For you..

 

BR, Rafael

 

Von: FM CH DIS Webshop Support
Gesendet: Montag, 17. November 2014 14:56
An: Burlet, Rafael
Betreff: WG: Schreibfehler WebShop

 

Hallo Rafael,

 

Wer ändert diese Texte? Bitte weiterleiten.

 

 

Mit freundlichen Grüßen / Best regards / Med vänlig hälsning

i.A. Oliver Sautter

Customer Integration Specialist

 

 

 

Distrelec Schuricht GmbH
Lise-Meitner-Straße 4
28359 Bremen
Germany
T +49 (421) 3654-261
F +49 (421) 3654-236
[1]oliver.sautter@distrelec.com
[2]www.distrelec.de

Bremen HRB 22748 – Geschäftsführer: Christian Lelonek, Jörg-Lothar Loch

This e-mail and any attachments may contain confidential information which is for the sole attention and use of the intended recipient. Please notify us at once if you are not the intended recipient and delete it immediately. Thank you.

 

 

 

Von: Latoschinski, Mignon
Gesendet: Montag, 10. November 2014 10:26
An: FM CH DIS Webshop Support
Cc: Doden, Eva; Ilie, Oana
Betreff: WG: Schreibfehler WebShop

 

Hi colleagues,

 

I got feedback of a wrong PropertyKey.

 

sentence: :“wenn Sie kein E-Mail als Login haben, bitte BENÜTZEN sie das untere Formular.

Actually the whole sentence is wrong.

 

Change to: „wenn Sie keine E-Mail als Login haben, dann benutzen Sie bitte das folgende Formular.“

 

 

BR

Mignon

 

 

Von: Doden, Eva

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6102] Redesign Review Cart // Modifications
item.description:
Could you please modify the following points:

1. Please change the color of the separation lines to the same color as the lines below. (gray)

2. The title attribute for the "Additional Address/Company Name" is missing.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Please test after the next deployment
Thanks

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6101] CH: Change of Copyright
item.description:
Please change the Copyright on the Swiss Website (all pages) to:
© 2015 Distrelec Group AG. Alle Rechte vorbehalten.
© 2015 Distrelec Group AG. All rights reserved.
© 2015 Distrelec Group AG. Tous droits réservés.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: fixed

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6095] Iframes are not working
item.description:
It seems like all embedded iframes in content pages are not working any more.
some links from content pages with iframes:
http://www.distrelec.ch/cms/printer_supplies_toner_ink_finder_wm_ch_1422
http://www.distrelec.de/cms/kingston_finder
http://www.distrelec.ch/cms/MobileStore
If you use the normal iframe URL, it's still working:
e.g.: Mobile Store:
http://distr.semi.ch/

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
the iframe component use a tag "iframe". In the tag file we call a file called "iframe.jsp" under the folder "/WEB-INF/terrific/modules/iframe/". However, this file does not exist or it was removed by mistake.

Ruben Diaz Roman | Distrelec : please check this issue, thx

Please test after the next deployment.
Thanks

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6073] Ariba // Automated form submit
item.description: Use terrific module for automated form submit for OCI/ARIBA CXML pages.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Please test after the next deployment.
Thanks!

Future Improvement: Add loading icon

Now we get an error 500 during the check out with Ariba/OCI interfaces.

You can test with:
https://www.distrelec.ch/ociEntry?username=webmaster@distrelec.com&password=123456&hook_url=http://q08.elfa.se:50000/elfa3/catalogdb/DisplayParametersServlet&oci_version=4.0

After some investigation I found the following issue:

janv. 05, 2015 10:57:21 AM org.apache.catalina.core.ApplicationDispatcher invoke
SEVERE: Servlet.service() for servlet jsp threw exception
org.apache.jasper.JasperException: /WEB-INF/views/desktop/pages/terrific/eprocurement/ociPage.jsp(18,1) No tag "eproc-success" defined in tag library imported with prefix "mod"
        at org.apache.jasper.compiler.DefaultErrorHandler.jspError(DefaultErrorHandler.java:40)
        at org.apache.jasper.compiler.ErrorDispatcher.dispatch(ErrorDispatcher.java:407)
        at org.apache.jasper.compiler.ErrorDispatcher.jspError(ErrorDispatcher.java:198)
        at org.apache.jasper.compiler.Parser.parseCustomTag(Parser.java:1187)
        at org.apache.jasper.compiler.Parser.parseElementsScriptless(Parser.java:1473)
        at org.apache.jasper.compiler.Parser.parseBody(Parser.java:1639)
        at org.apache.jasper.compiler.Parser.parseOptionalBody(Parser.java:978)
        at org.apache.jasper.compiler.Parser.parseCustomTag(Parser.java:1246)
        at org.apache.jasper.compiler.Parser.parseElements(Parser.java:1424)
        at org.apache.jasper.compiler.Parser.parse(Parser.java:130)
        at org.apache.jasper.compiler.ParserController.doParse(ParserController.java:255)
        at org.apache.jasper.compiler.ParserController.parse(ParserController.java:103)
        at org.apache.jasper.compiler.Compiler.generateJava(Compiler.java:185)
        at org.apache.jasper.compiler.Compiler.compile(Compiler.java:354)
        at org.apache.jasper.compiler.Compiler.compile(Compiler.java:334)
        at org.apache.jasper.compiler.Compiler.compile(Compiler.java:321)
        at org.apache.jasper.JspCompilationContext.compile(JspCompilationContext.java:592)
        at org.apache.jasper.servlet.JspServletWrapper.service(JspServletWrapper.java:328)
        at org.apache.jasper.servlet.JspServlet.serviceJspFile(JspServlet.java:313)
        at org.apache.jasper.servlet.JspServlet.service(JspServlet.java:260)
        at javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet.service(HttpServlet.java:717)

this means that the tag "eproc-success" used in the file "ociPage.jsp" does not exist.
FE issue fixed by committing missing files

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5474] SEO - Duplication issue - rel="alternate" - hreflang="x-default" to fix
item.description:
Observations :

  • With the tiquet http://www.jira.distrelec.com/browse/DISTRELEC-4590 the alternate meta tag functionnality have been implemented on everyweb pages.
  • The hreflang="x-default" is not fixed, on every language alternative page the content of the url is changing into the lang of the page
    exemples :
    http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Werkzeuge-%26-Messtechnik/c/cat-L1D_379513
    <link rel="alternate" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/Werkzeuge-%26-Messtechnik/c/cat-L1D_379513" hreflang="x-default"/>
<link rel="alternate" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/en/Tools-%26-Measurement/c/cat-L1D_379513" hreflang="en-ch"/>
<link rel="alternate" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Werkzeuge-%26-Messtechnik/c/cat-L1D_379513" hreflang="de-ch"/>
<link rel="alternate" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/fr/Outils-et-mesure/c/cat-L1D_379513" hreflang="fr-ch"/>
    http://www.distrelec.ch/fr/Outils-et-mesure/c/cat-L1D_379513
    <link rel="alternate" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/Outils-et-mesure/c/cat-L1D_379513" hreflang="x-default"/>
<link rel="alternate" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/en/Tools-%26-Measurement/c/cat-L1D_379513" hreflang="en-ch"/>
<link rel="alternate" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Werkzeuge-%26-Messtechnik/c/cat-L1D_379513" hreflang="de-ch"/>
<link rel="alternate" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/fr/Outils-et-mesure/c/cat-L1D_379513" hreflang="fr-ch"/>

Impacts :

  • Google Bot don't understand the defaut hreflang="x-default" since it is dynamic on every page.

Demands :

  • Define the shop default language as the hreflang="x-default" url content language on every url pattern (product, category, manufacturer...).
    Exemple :
    http://www.distrelec.ch/fr/Outils-et-mesure/c/cat-L1D_379513
    <link rel="alternate" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/Werkzeuge-%26-Messtechnik/c/cat-L1D_379513" hreflang="x-default"/>
<link rel="alternate" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/en/Tools-%26-Measurement/c/cat-L1D_379513" hreflang="en-ch"/>
<link rel="alternate" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Werkzeuge-%26-Messtechnik/c/cat-L1D_379513" hreflang="de-ch"/>
<link rel="alternate" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/fr/Outils-et-mesure/c/cat-L1D_379513" hreflang="fr-ch"/>
    http://www.distrelec.ch/en/Tools-%26-Measurement/c/cat-L1D_379513
    <link rel="alternate" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/Werkzeuge-%26-Messtechnik/c/cat-L1D_379513" hreflang="x-default"/>
<link rel="alternate" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/en/Tools-%26-Measurement/c/cat-L1D_379513" hreflang="en-ch"/>
<link rel="alternate" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Werkzeuge-%26-Messtechnik/c/cat-L1D_379513" hreflang="de-ch"/>
<link rel="alternate" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/fr/Outils-et-mesure/c/cat-L1D_379513" hreflang="fr-ch"/>

Checking process :

  • This issue can't be closed without my final live check.
  • Thank you to update the status of the implementation in the comment below.
item.summary: SEO - Duplication issue - rel="alternate" - hreflang="x-default" to fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: please review

I have tested it and it seems to be ok.
We had to do a live deployment.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6084] Optimize price import by an additional DB index
item.description:
During a CSV price file import the JDBC log shows some slow SQL statements:

item.summary: Optimize price import by an additional DB index

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
The import currently takes 1 hour for 582874 lines.

23 Dec 2014 00:15:29 INFO  [task-scheduler-7] (00004FQR) [Importer] Finished 1 pass in 0d 01h:00m:00s:682ms - processed: 582874, dumped: 461 (last pass: 0)

I assume the import can be speed up by a factor of 5.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6074] Promotion Label: Name length
item.description: The naming of the promotion label "Heisses Angebot" is too long for the search result list.

status.description: This issue was once resolved, but the resolution was deemed incorrect. From here issues are either marked assigned or resolved.

comments.comment:
Hi Florian
Attached you can find an overview of all promotion labels and their translation. Hot offer should stay in all languages the same and should not be translated. Please change back to hot offer.
Thanks, Sarah
please review
